typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(sql_query = $sql_query,
		qc_id = $qc_id) ~> TestQuery
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as string,
		{Deactivation Date} as string,
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['test_loop_sql_out.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	nucc_year_raw_file_suffix as string,
	data_year as string
}
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Deactivation Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('nucc_taxonomy_',$nucc_year_raw_file_suffix,'.csv'))]) ~> ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy
ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy derive(year = $data_year) ~> AddYear
AddYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> LoadToSQL

parameters{
	nucc_year_raw_file_suffix as string,
	data_year as string
}
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Deactivation Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('nucc_taxonomy_',$nucc_year_raw_file_suffix,'.csv'))]) ~> ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy
ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy derive(year = $data_year) ~> AddYear
AddYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,

    iif({Entity Type Code}=='2', 'Organization', {Entity Type Code})),
		data_month = toInteger(data_month),
		{Active Flag} = iif({NPI Deactivation Date} != '' && {NPI Reactivation Date} == '', '0', '1'),

		{Last Update Date} = toDate({Last Update Date}, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		{NPI Deactivation Date} = toDate({NPI Deactivation Date}, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		{NPI Reactivation Date} = toDate({NPI Reactivation Date}, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		{Certification Date} = toDate({Certification Date}, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 100)) ~> DerivedColumn1

ProviderTaxonomyMonth derive(current_flag = '1') ~> AddCurrentFlag
AddCurrentFlag unpivot(output(
		name as string,
		value as string
	),
	ungroupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Normalized
Filter1 derive(name_standard = left(name,instr(name,'_')-1),
		position = right(name,(length(name)-instr(name,'_')))) ~> RefineFieldNamePos
RefineFieldNamePos pivot(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		position),
	pivotBy(name_standard),
	{} = first(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
ProviderOtherIdentifiers derive(current_flag = '1') ~> AddCurrentFlagProvOtherID
AddCurrentFlagProvOtherID unpivot(output(
		name as string,
		value as string
	),
	ungroupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> NormalizedProvOtherID
Filter2 derive(name_standard = left(name,instr(name,'_')-1),
		position = right(name,(length(name)-instr(name,'_')))) ~> RefineFieldNamePosProvOtherID
RefineFieldNamePosProvOtherID pivot(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		position),
	pivotBy(name_standard),
	{} = first(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot2
Pivot2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='position'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Normalized filter(!(isNull(value) || value == '')) ~> Filter1
NormalizedProvOtherID filter(!(isNull(value) || value == '')) ~> Filter2

	validateSchema: false,
	input(
